name: Vishva Pujara
subTitle: Data Scientist | Master in Finance
professionalSummary: Experienced Ecommerce Tech Architect with a strong background in PHP and GoLang, offering over 10 years of expertise. Demonstrates a deep passion for software engineering and a particular focus on e-commerce webshop development using popular frameworks such as Magento and Spryker. Exhibits a keen interest in acquiring knowledge and adopting new e-commerce frameworks. Skilled in utilizing GoLang to create efficient microservices that meet business needs. Committed to employing test and behavior-driven development methodologies, with proficiency in Scrum and Lean Kanban methodologies.

skills.title: Soft Skills
items: Communication with clients, team, and across projects
Defining practices within the team (code of conduct) for various things like definition of done, structure of project documentation, test suites, support run books, etc.

skills.title: Tech Skills
items: Testing frameworks: PHPUnit, PHPSpec, Behat, gomock, sqlmock
Javascript frameworks & libraries: jQuery, KnockoutJs, React (beginner)
Tools: Postman, Jira, Git, Slack, Trello, Pivotal Tracker
Event streaming & message queue: Kafka, RabbitMQ

workday.title: How do I spend my day at work?
duties: Code reviews: every morning I mostly spend some time doing the code reviews and providing constructive feedback.

Agile ceremonies: dailies and weeklies, talking with the team to find out how the sprint is progressing, whether there are any blockers or someone needs help. Assess the overall situation and possible risks. Talking with POs and analysts to define the next set of work.
Pairing sessions: lots of them with different teammates for doing code reviews together, helping them solve bugs or providing support for development of complex tasks.

Development: I like to spend some time doing code on my own for complex tasks or tricky issues. Normally I work on tasks which define the processes or tools which help the team to do their work efficiently. For example, integration of a new test framework, integration of Kafka with the project, adding a profiling tool to project setup, etc.
Extra activities: Tech interviews, participate in RFP proposals to provide technical solutions based on Spryker,
